data.title: Self Storage Units in La Plata, MD
data.meta_description: Self Storage Plus on N. La Plata Court in MD offers secure, drive-up access storage for your home or commercial needs. Rent online today!
data.text:
Whether you’re moving into the area and need a place to store your belongings while your family transitions into their new home, or you’re expanding your business on Crain Highway and can’t fit all the inventory inside of your current location, Self Storage Plus has you covered with Room to Pursue Life®!

You’ll find our self storage facility minutes away from the College of Southern Maryland in north La Plata. We’re right off U.S. Route 301 and just across the street from the University of Maryland Charles Regional Rehabilitation Center. Our facility near Rosewick Road is in an excellent location for residents and businesses of Pomfret, White Plains, Bryantown, and more.

North La Plata, MD, Storage Features and Amenities

Self Storage Plus in La Plata has all of the features to match everything you’re looking for in a storage unit. Units at Self Storage Plus come in a variety of sizes that range from 5’ x 5’ to 10’ x 30’, with many in between. Even if you aren’t yet sure what size of a unit you should rent, we have a unit size page to help get you started.

At our facility in north La Plata, MD, not only do we aim to get you the right amount of space, but we also want your unit to have everything you need it to. You probably don’t want to spend an entire day moving your belongings into or out of a storage unit. A drive-up storage unit can be the best way to maximize convenience. Many of our units are exterior and can easily fit your car, truck, or moving van right in front of it, saving you the time and trouble of carrying everything for long distances.

Other features include:

Climate-controlled units

24/7 recording

Parking

Extended access hours

Indoor Climate Controlled Storage Units in La Plata, MD

For many belongings you plan to store, a regular storage unit can be perfect. But if you think you’ll be storing items such as leather or wooden furniture, electronics, or musical instruments, you’ll want to consider a climate-controlled storage unit.

In La Plata, MD, our temperatures in the wintertime can get quite low. These extreme weather conditions can cause sensitive belongings to warp, crack, or be damaged if not stored properly. A climate-controlled storage unit in La Plata provides an extra layer of protection against extreme temperatures so you can have peace of mind for your items no matter the weather outside.

Personal and Commercial Storage in La Plata, MD

Space within your home or business in La Plata is limited, even if it felt like it would always be enough when you first started. If you’ve accumulated too much and can no longer get it put away without crushing something, you could use a self storage unit! Self Storage Plus offers great units for personal and commercial storage in La Plata, MD.

From small businesses just starting out to those that have been around for decades, there are plenty of reasons to utilize self storage. If your back room is overflowing with inventory or your home office has turned into an obstacle course with boxes of documents, self storage could be the solution to your self storage needs. Choose from a variety of unit sizes and rent for a few months or the foreseeable future depending on your needs.

Reserve or Rent Your La Plata Storage Unit Today

Don’t let a cramped space hold you back! With Self Storage Plus, you can have Room to Pursue Life® once again. Check out our packing, storage, and moving guides if you’re unsure of where to start, or if you have self storage questions, take a look at our FAQ page or contact us!

Get started and find storage today! Give us a call or rent or reserve online. Visit our Waldorf storage facility nearby for more options!

Frequently Asked Questions About Storage in La Plata, MD
